Package pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers

This package contains classes that listens for read, write and system events.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Database_ReadEventHandler The Database_ReadEventHandler handles all database events that require reading from the database
Database_SystemEventHandler A class that manages the database event handler classes
Database_WriteEventHandler The database write event handler handles all database events that require writing to the database
 

Package pizzaProgram.database.eventHandlers Description

This package contains classes that listens for read, write and system events. When an event is received the corresponding database action is performed by the listeners.
